Headline: #7 Harrison, #126 Jackson Temporary Eatsbound Reroute near Congress Plaza
ShortDescription: EB 7 Harrison, 126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted via Michigan, Balbo, Columbus, Ida B. Wells, and Congress due to, street blockage near Congress Plaza.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #7 Harrison and #126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted via Michigan, Balbo, Columbus, Ida B. Wells, and Congress due to, street blockage near Congress Plaza.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier unauthorized person on the tracks at 87th. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier unauthorized person on the tracks at 87th. 

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #70 Division Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Dearborn/Oak
ShortDescription: EB 70 Division buses are temporarily rerouted via Division, State and Walton due to, street blockage near Dearborn/Oak.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #70 Division buses are temporarily rerouted via Division, State and Walton due to, street blockage near Dearborn/Oak.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 95th-bound Red Line Service Delayed at 69th
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line trains are standing at 63rd due to a fire near the tracks. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red Line trains are standing at 63rd due to a fire near the tracks.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
